title: Calories in In-N-Out Cheeseburger
meta_description: Discover in n out cheeseburger calories: about 480 kcal per burger, plus full macros like protein, fat, carbs, and tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard single cheeseburger: 100% beef patty, American cheese, toasted bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out cheeseburger has 480 kcal, 22 g protein, and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard, pickles)
No spread (protein style, wrapped in lettuce)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: 480 kcal for the standard single cheeseburger.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out cheeseburger calories?
faqs.a: 22 g protein, 27 g fat (11 g saturated), 39 g carbs (3 g fiber, 10 g sugars).

faqs.q: Is the In-N-Out cheeseburger high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 830 mg sodium per burger from the spread and ingredients.

faqs.q: How does protein style affect In-N-Out cheeseburger calories?
faqs.a: Swapping bun for lettuce reduces calories by ~90 to 390 kcal total.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out cheeseburger calories the same everywhere?
faqs.a: Generally consistent, but slight variations may occur by location or fresh prep.
